3.panel_description: Search for available hotels in Paris.

1.handles: Searches for hotel options in Paris for the specified dates.

input_vars.name: hotel_search_query
input_vars.description: Query to find hotel options in Paris from October 5th to October 10th, 2024.
input_vars.value: Find hotel options in Paris from October 5th to October 10th, 2024.

output_vars.name: hotel_options
output_vars.description: List of available hotels in Paris.
